title: Interpretation of seeing yellow apples in a dream for unmarried women

preview.html: In the following article, the Encyclopedia provides an interpretation of seeing a yellow apple in a dream, which is one of the most important fruits spread and known all over the world, and its history dates back to the beginning of its discovery in Central Asia. Health. As for the yellow color of it, its connotations do not differ much from the rest of the types, and when the dreamer sees it, he is often optimistic because it is a sweet-tasting fruit that everyone loves. Therefore, in the following paragraphs, we present an interpretation of buying it in a dream, collecting it and eating it, whether for single or married women or men, follow us. Yellow apple in a dream In what the great scholar Ibn Sirin narrated about seeing a yellow apple in a dream, we present the following interpretations: It is considered a praiseworthy vision and an indication of goodness and happiness in general and a prediction of food and children. The dreamer who holds a fresh yellow apple shows his good behavior among those around him and their appreciation for him. That the dreamer sells it symbolizes that he is a persevering and ambitious person who seeks success and does not know the path of laziness. Eating is one of the good visions that symbolize the fulfillment of desires and the response to supplication by the command of God. In a man's dream, it shows a great deal and a great relationship, while in a woman's dream, it shows beauty and self-respect. Cutting a yellow apple is a sign of love to help the needy and readiness to perform the duty of zakat. Getting injured while cutting a yellow apple indicates disputes and estrangement between parents and relatives. Shade in the shade of an apple tree or sitting next to it is a sign of repentance from sins and walking on the path of guidance and repentance. Planting apples symbolizes sponsoring an orphan and picking it from the tree is life A good and lawful thing that the dreamer earns from a good deed. Buying apples in a dream for a single woman In the following points, we mention the signs of seeing a single woman buying yellow apples in a dream or planting and picking them: Her purchase of apples indicates a love affair that ends in a happy marriage by the command of God. This dream may symbolize traveling soon to perform the Hajj or Umrah. This dream may indicate that she occupies a prestigious position from which she will earn a legitimate profit, and if what she bought is spoiled, it represents a loss and failure in her emotional or professional life. The rotten yellow apple symbolizes the failure of the choices and decisions made by free people and they need to reconsider themselves on this issue. A yellow apple in a dream for a married woman In the following paragraph, we present all the interpretations that have been mentioned regarding the married woman’s vision of this dream: Her preservation and tattoo symbolizes the kindness of her religion, good worship, and her adherence to performing duties out of fear of God Almighty and a desire for His pleasure. Eating a yellow apple symbolizes an imminent pregnancy and the birth of a good man with her and his father. Eating a rotten yellow apple is a bad vision that indicates illness or exposure For marital problems and disputes, and God Almighty knows best. Picking apples in a dream Picking a lot of apples from the tree and then doing so means that you earn a lot of money. It can sometimes symbolize the evil eye and envy, and it is a sign of the need to resort to God Almighty and fortify ourselves with His preserved verses.

title: Complete interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream is complete. Potatoes are one of the most delicious and marketable vegetables in the world. Therefore, we have collected for you, dear God, the interpretation of seeing cooked potatoes from the greatest scholars in interpretation and visions, and we have also collected for you what is the interpretation of seeing picking potatoes for singles. Pregnant and married women as well as men through the Trend website specialized in the science of instant translation. What is the interpretation of seeing potatoes for Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin said about potatoes in a dream in full, because it indicates a change in circumstances for the better. Planting potatoes in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals that the dreamer was trying to achieve. What is the interpretation of seeing cooked potatoes indicates progress in business and success. Boiled potatoes in a person's dream indicate an increase in money. And completely rotten potatoes in a dream are unpleasant visions that do not bode well. Interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream is complete for an ordinary woman. Interpretation of eating fried potatoes in a dream for a general woman indicates that she is going through a difficult period full of exhaustion in her life. Also, seeing potatoes in general in a girl's dream shows the girl's meanings in life from problems. Potatoes in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate failure and loss. Most dream interpreters reported that seeing potatoes in a dream in full for an ordinary woman is one of the unpleasant dreams for her, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing potatoes for a married woman? Seeing potatoes in a married woman's dream can be a sign of failure in her life. The interpretation of seeing a complete potato market in a dream indicates that you are facing a difficult period and a shortage in Money. If a woman sees herself in a dream cooking potatoes completely, this is good news for goodness and comfort, and it is one of the visions worthy of praise for her. Seeing potatoes in a dream for a pregnant woman The interpretation of seeing potatoes completely in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will get rid of the pain and illness she suffers from. Also, the dream of stuffed potatoes for a pregnant woman means kindness and large meals, as it indicates good health. Peeling potatoes in a dream completely for a pregnant woman is one of the desirable visions that indicate an easy and affordable birth. What is the interpretation of seeing potatoes for a man? Seeing fully ripe potatoes in a man's dream means good things that will come in his life. The dream in which he eats potatoes indicates haste in making decisions in his life. Unripe potatoes indicate the presence of an enemy in a person and a conspiracy against him. Potatoes in a married man's dream indicate a financial crisis and instability. The presence of potatoes in a young man's dream is considered the most annoying thing in his life, but this period does not last long. In some cases, seeing potatoes in a young man's dream indicates his closeness to him. And eating delicious potatoes in a person's dream indicates his food and goodness in the afterlife. What is the interpretation of seeing a potato harvest? Seeing a full harvest of potatoes in a dream means that The dreamer will collect a lot of money in his next life. Also, dreaming of harvesting a lot of potatoes symbolizes great goodness and blessings.

title: What is the most important interpretation of a dream of intense crying from injustice?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about screaming loudly about injustice: The most difficult thing a person goes through in his life is feeling injustice or depriving someone of his rights. The oppressed person usually turns to God, prays to him, complains about his condition, and is flooded with tears. Intense crying in a dream varies depending on the psychological state of the person, and crying can express joy and can indicate sadness and persecution. Interpretation of a dream about crying out loud from injustice. Seeing intense crying in a dream indicates exhaustion, a body burdened with psychological and moral pain, and fog that covers all aspects of life, And the dark vision that floats around every goal that a person wants to achieve but cannot achieve. With regard to seeing injustice in a dream, this vision expresses the many turmoil that the dreamer will witness in his life, the amount of destruction that will haunt the oppressor, and the many punishments that he will not be able to escape from, And the big loss. In this world and the hereafter. But if a person sees that he is crying a lot because of injustice, this indicates the necessity of relying on God and deferring the matter to Him, and trusting that rights, even if they are taken away, will return to their owners, even if the time comes. Great. This vision indicates almost relief, changing circumstances for the better, restoring what was stolen from him, achieving his purpose and need sooner or later, and defeating those who wronged him in this world. That a severe torment will be inflicted on him, and in the afterlife, when God punishes the wrongdoers by throwing them into the fire of Hell. In the event that crying is heard, this indicates the person’s inability to bear what happened to him and his repeated complaints, lack of acceptance of the conditions in which he lives, and loss of the ability to control himself and his forms. . Stubbornness, resentment, and complaining about the harm he caused him. But if the screaming is in a muffled voice, or trapped inside, then this symbolizes supplication, insistence, and supplication to God, asking for compensation for what happened to him, relying on Him in all other matters, and being content with fate. It is good and bad, And be patient in distress without opposing the divine will. Seeing intense crying from injustice is one of the visions that has a psychological significance, as it expresses disturbed feelings, deep-rooted desires, and things that a person cannot collect in reality, so he tries to reap them in his dream. The vision also indicates the inability to achieve victory. On the one who causes him harm and harm, and the inability to cope due to the circumstances that return all the oppressor to the oppressed, which leads the person to feel injustice and psychological pain, and this confirms that the subconscious in the dream. Intense crying in a dream is a reflection of someone who cries less in reality and does not He likes to show his weakness and weakness in front of others and prefers to appear strong, no matter how difficult the circumstances and life are. If the crying is accompanied by many cold tears, then this is a sign of almost God’s comfort, restoring what was lost and stolen, bringing joy and pleasure into the heart of the dreamer, and great compensation with the one who compensates. God grants his loved ones patience, trustworthiness, and contentment with His judgment and judgment. If the tears are hot, this indicates the duration of the period of sadness, the succession of worries and problems in the person, and the

title: The symbol of cooked rice in Ibn Sirin’s dream

preview.html: Cooked rice in a dream is one of the good dreams that are repeated a lot. One can see in his dream that he is eating cooked rice or distributing it to people or that he is cooking rice for a pregnant woman. We have also provided you with the most prominent interpretations of seeing cooked rice in a dream by the most famous jurists of interpretation. And it is the sign of Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Asimi. Cooked rice in a dream Most commentators say that cooked rice is generally a sign of prosperity and well-being, but if the rice is yellow, it is not good for the dreamer because he suffers from some health problems and illness. Cooked rice in a dream and it was delicious, this indicates the emergence of wonderful and positive things in the dreamer's life and getting rid of the difficult period he lived. If one sees cooked rice in a dream, but it becomes raw, this indicates a lack of many things in his life, that is, he is going through some things that prevent him from achieving his ambitions. Cooked rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin Whoever sees that he is cooking rice in a dream, this indicates that food and money will reach the viewer without effort or fatigue. And whoever dreams of cooked and ready rice in a pot, this is evidence of the profit that the dreamer earns from his work or project. If one sees in his dream that he is cooking rice grains with its husks, this is a sign that he will spend the money he has collected and saved in the future. And whoever dreams of eating rice with meat, this is a sign of joy and happiness for the dreamer, and God knows best. Seeing him eating cooked rice In a dream, this is evidence that the dreamer will be granted allowances after long effort and hardships. Cooked rice in a dream for Al-Osaimi If one sees in a dream that he is cooking rice, this means that the dreamer will obtain his livelihood without difficulty. Seeing the dreamer in his dream that he is cooking rice with its husks is evidence of spending the money he has saved. If one sees in a dream that he is cooking yellow or spoiled rice, this is a sign of the calamities and difficulties that the dreamer will face in the future. Cooked rice in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi sees that rice in a dream is a sign that he is entering into a difficult matter. Also, the dream of cooked rice in a dream indicates profit and benefit. And whoever sees that he kept rice and spoiled it in a dream, he works without pay or benefit. Seeing spoiled rice also indicates corruption of intentions and livelihood. Cooked rice in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Seeing white rice in general in a dream is evidence of a lot of money and livelihood that the dreamer will earn in the future and that all his earned money will be from legitimate and lawful means. As for the dream of yellow rice, it indicates a health problem that The dreamer will face it in the coming days. If a married man dreams that he is eating cooked rice with his wife, this indicates the love and affection between them and also shows a stable life between them. The online dream interpretation site is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just type the online dream interpretation site, search in Google and get the correct interpretations. Cooked rice in a dream for a single woman The interpretation of seeing cooked rice for a single woman in a dream is bread

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about theft for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin?  Interpretation of a dream of a thief for a single woman stealing food in a dream for a single woman and interpretation of a dream of stealing clothes for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about stealing for a single woman: The matter varies depending on the thief or what was stolen from him. Rather, stealing is taboo, and exposure to it is followed by a state of anxiety and sadness, so what if it comes in a dream? Is it a good shame or does it portend something harmful? This is what we examine in our following lines with the utmost precision and completeness. Interpretation of a dream of stealing from single women by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about stealing for a single woman? Stealing in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that the viewer will be exposed to a state of sadness and sorrow as a result of missing opportunities that she wanted to exploit to improve her life’s circumstances. While Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing a single woman being robbed, but she is not interested in the matter and seems at peace, is a sign that she is approaching the date of her engagement and transition to a new life. Who enjoys stability and comfort with her husband. If something dear to her is stolen in a dream from an unmarried woman, this is a sign of her connection and attachment to an inappropriate person with whom she is disappointed. Also, seeing an unmarried woman indicates that she is being stolen from among large crowds, as it warns her of To stop the sins and sins that she commits, she must repent and approach God and follow the path of righteousness. Interpretation of a dream about single women stealing by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets a single woman’s vision of stealing in a dream as being surrounded by a group of people conspiring against her and trying to harm her, so she must be careful. And be careful and do not trust anyone blindly. Seeing a single woman having her bag stolen in a dream means that she will face many obstacles that will prevent her from achieving her planned goals. Seeing an unmarried woman having her house robbed indicates that she will marry her soon, move to a new house, and that it will be There are many good changes in her coming days. Seeing an unmarried woman whose money was stolen symbolizes her engagement and engagement to a pious man with an excellent financial level with whom she will live a calm and stable life. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on an Egyptian website for dream interpretation, Which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretive scholars.. Being robbed in a dream for a single woman. All dream interpretation scholars agreed that an unmarried woman who was robbed in a dream is one of the visions with multiple connotations, which vary according to what was stolen from her and her condition during the theft, but in general it indicates the approaching The appointment. The groom’s engagement or promotion with her, who has a good reputation and a prestigious job. Interpretation of a dream about theft for an unmarried woman while she is among family or friends also symbolizes that she will be exposed to many family problems and disturbances, or that major arguments will break out with her friends and the girl will be subjected to the theft of her mobile phone. A phone in a dream indicates that someone is spying on her and wants to know everything about her personal life, in addition to an indication that she has missed many important opportunities that would significantly change the course of her life. title: Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand for a married woman, interpretation of a dream about henna on the right hand, and interpretation of a dream about henna on the left hand

preview.html: Below are the most powerful interpretations of a dream about henna on the hand of a married woman. Henna on the hand of a married woman in her dream has many meanings, and according to the shape and color of the henna patterns, you will learn the exact interpretation. In this article you will find the strongest indicators of this symbol. Depending on.Interpretation of a dream about henna on the hand of a married woman. Beautiful henna patterns. If a married woman draws them in a dream, the scene means the bliss and luxury in which she lives. Some jurists said that the dream indicates her commitment and fulfillment of her religious duties. The more beautiful and expensive the henna is, the more the scene will suggest the richness of her marriage, as it works. In his work, he strives to make her happy and does not lack anything. If a married woman dreams that the henna she painted on her hand is bad, and the inscriptions are incomprehensible, and its appearance is frightening, then this indicates her great sadness over her husband’s behavior towards her, as he is a person full of bad qualities and with him. Who do not feel comfortable and accepted. If the dreamer is in reality disobedient, desires false desires, abandons prayer and religious teachings, and sees that henna is placed only on her fingertips and the palm of her hand is white, then this indicates that it is her life. She is stained with many sins and the scene at this moment is a warning and urges her to repent to escape God’s punishment. When she dreams of a wedding in her house (provided that it is not full of music and dancing) and she sees women drawing henna for each other while she is happy and in a state of happiness and positive energy, the dreamer may be Happy with any of the following events: Or not: Surviving an illness or restoring her relationship with her husband again (if they were already quarreling). Second: The recovery of one of her children or the husband’s escape from a misfortune that befell him before. Third: The celebration of her husband’s promotion and acquisition of a higher professional position. It makes them live at a better social level than before. Fourth: Her children may be absent from the school year and move on to another year, so she will throw a party for them soon. Some interpreters said that henna on the hand of a married woman in a dream indicates her great giving, and there are four aspects of giving. Can she practice it during her life: or not: Perhaps she works in voluntary organizations to relieve people’s pain and satisfy a small part of their needs so that her good deeds will increase and her grave will expand after her death. Second: One of the most famous acts of generosity in a woman’s life is protecting her children and giving them a lot of her money so that they can build A bright future, that is, she provides them with material assistance and saves them from harm. Of distress and need. Third: The dreamer can honor her husband and give him money if he goes through financial difficulties in the future, and sometimes the dream means that he gives money to the dreamer’s family if she is exposed to crises. Fourth: Perhaps the dreamer allocates part of her money to the poor and needy, and this means that she feels pleasure and happiness when She gives to others and gives them what they lack in their lives. One of the most famous negative connotations of this dream is that if henna is applied to the dreamer’s hand under pressure, then the dream suggests that she is being forced and deprived of her freedom in reality. In continuation of the previous dream, if she sees her husband or someone else applying henna to him

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake chasing me for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin and interpretation of a dream about escaping from a snake

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake chasing me for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about a snake chasing me for a single woman in a dream. Is the interpretation of the dream bad in all cases? Does the color of the snake change the general meaning of the dream? What do interpreters think about interpreting this symbol? Is hunting a huge snake different from a small snake in interpretation? These are important questions and we will answer them in detail in the following article. Interpretation of dreams of a snake chasing me for a single woman. There are symbols, if seen in a dream, that indicate treachery, cunning, and betrayal by relatives, friends, and acquaintances, and the snake or serpent symbol belongs to These are warning symbols in a dream. When an unmarried woman sees a snake looking at her, crawling behind her and wanting to control her until it bites her, then he is a person who hates her very much and is making a great effort to ruin her life. Some jurists have opined that when a snake is chasing a girl in a dream, it may be a lowly, evil boy who is chasing her with intent. Being obscene with her and causing her to be obscene. Another section of jurists said that a snake in a dream does not necessarily indicate an enemy from the people or from the people, and it could be a dangerous enemy of devils and jinn, and chasing the dreamer is evidence of his capture. In order to be protected from attacks by jinn and demons, he must recite remembrances, persevere in reciting the Qur’an, pray, and constantly pray for divine protection and avoid harm, whether from jinn. Or a human being. If a single woman saw that a snake was inside her house and was chasing her from one room to another, then God has made it clear to her that her enemy is of her own blood and lives with her in the same house. But if the dreamer dreamed that she was walking on a road and saw many snakes chasing her, and she resisted everything Until you reach the desired place safely and peacefully, the dream indicates unknown enemies that you will meet all the time. Her life, specifically as she walks on the path of her future and achieves her goals, but in the end success comes from her division, and God gives her strength and courage in facing enemies. Interpretation of a dream about a snake chasing me for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that when a person sees a snake in a dream chasing an unmarried woman, this means that he is in danger. And according to the shape of the snake, we will know what type of danger it is. If she sees a multi-headed snake, and is very afraid of it in the dream, and runs away so as not to reach it, then the dream shows her the strength of her enemy and the danger of his cunning. If she sees a white snake chasing her, some interpreters said that the most dangerous colors Snakes are black and white, and the interpretation of a white snake shows a person who is very hypocritical, lies and completely hides his true character and the dreamer appears. She has good intentions and a false, pure heart, but in reality he is a dirtier person, and this dream asks the dreamer to warn the people closest to her, because the evil that will destroy her life will be from these people, and God knows best. The best. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of dreams of a black snake chasing me for a single woman. The black snake or serpent indicates a violent genie who wants to harm the visionary in any way, whether by

title: Interpretation of seeing Medina in a dream.. Interpretation of seeing Medina in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing Medina in a dream? A question asked by many who have seen this dream in the past to determine the interpretations of this dream. Maneuvering and praying in the Prophet’s Mosque next to performing Umrah. This city is considered one of the most prominent holy places for Muslims, as it is the city to which the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, migrated from Mecca to complete his noble prophetic mission. This we will present to you in the following lines of the encyclopedia. What is the interpretation of a dream about traveling to Medina? If you see yourself traveling to Medina in a dream, the meaning of this dream lies in the abundance of sustenance with money. If the dreamer dreams of traveling to Medina with the intention of staying there, The interpretation of this is that he is going through a positive stage in his life. This vision represents for the dreamer obtaining a promotion at work or moving to work in a better job than the previous one, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of visiting the city in a dream (by Al-Nabulsi) The scholar Al-Nabulsi said about seeing the city in a dream It is evidence of the presence of good and great provision for the dreamer in his life and in his religion. Whoever sees in his dream that he is in front of the Holy Kaaba and standing at the door of the chamber, this is evidence that the dreamer has repented to God with irrevocable repentance, and that God, Blessed and Most High, repents. Whoever sees in his dream that he is going to perform Umrah or Hajj and go to Medina, this is evidence that the dreamer will ease his worries and anxiety, and God Almighty will allow him to visit His Noble House. (And God knows best). Interpretation of a dream about the city in a dream (by Ibn Shaheen) The great scholar Ibn Shaheen said that he saw the city in a dream, indicating that the dreamer will be blessed by God Almighty, with very good work and trade, from which he will earn a lot of food and money. Whoever saw in his dream That he is in Medina, near the grave of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, this is great evidence that the dreamer will have a good deed and his position in Paradise and among the people of Paradise, God willing. And whoever sees in his dream that he is going to the Holy Mosque and Medina, this is evidence of his and the dreamer’s repentance and adherence to the religion of Islam ( And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the city in a dream (by Ibn Sirin) The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing the city in a dream is one of the dreams that brings goodness and great livelihood to the dreamer, as it indicates forgiveness and repentance to God. This indicates that God will provide the dreamer with great and extensive sustenance. And that he will visit the Kaaba and Medina, God willing, in the near future (and God knows best). Seeing Medina in a dream indicates the abundance of knowledge that the dreamer has in religion. This vision also symbolizes the extent of the dreamer’s desire to benefit others with his knowledge of religion, and God knows best. The dream indicates stability. The psychological state of the dreamer and the feeling of safety and reassurance. One of the most prominent symbols of praise for seeing Medina is that it expresses the forgiveness of sins, a return to God, and the avoidance of prohibitions that the dreamer was committing. If the fortuneteller dreams that he goes to Medina and visits the grave of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, while he is in a state of tears. This dream promises him good news of the end of the month

title: Interpretation of a dream about a veil by seeing a veil in a dream

preview.html: Showing the hijab of a single woman to a married woman to a pregnant woman to a divorced woman, whether black, white, colored, taking off her clothes, wearing it, losing it, buying it for Al-Nabulsi and more. Dream interpretation jurists say that seeing the hijab in a dream is one of the visions that brings a lot of goodness in general. In a man’s dream there is luck and in a woman’s dream. Cover.Interpretation of a dream about the veil by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that if a girl dreams of wearing a white veil, this means that she will get married soon or will succeed in studying. If she sees that she is taking off her hijab in a dream, this indicates separation and abandonment, and it also indicates that her circumstances are changing for the worse. If a young man dreams of a girl taking off her hijab, this means that he will do a good deed for people, but they will not thank him for it. The girl’s hijab: What separates two things and the hijab covers you, and if you dream that you are wearing the hijab, this means that you are not completely loyal to the one you love and you will use tricks and deception to keep him. Seeing others wearing the hijab means that fake friends are trying to harm you and harm you. Interpretation of a dream about the hijab by Ibn Shaheen. Whoever sees a set of niqab or eyebrow does not bode well, especially if he is frowning. It has been said that seeing a veiled woman indicates that something is being hidden from the person seeing it, and some commentators dislike its expression, that is, expressing the vision of a veiled woman in a sentence. It was said: Whoever sees that she has become a visor and is not doing what he owes, then there is nothing wrong with him. It was said that the vision of the eyebrow covered the evil, and it was said that dismissal was a blessing for those with jobs and stability in matters, and it was said that the task had two sides: for those whose professional lives were praised. In their place they are righteous and exalted, and those who are mentioned will be expelled. Taking off the veil and wearing it in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that if a woman sees in a dream that she is taking off her veil and then putting it on again, then she is on a completely wrong path, but she has returned to the path of truth again. It is true that he wants to correct many of the mistakes he committed, but if he saw that he was wearing the hijab, but he flew in the air by himself. This indicates that there are many people who persecute her and want to remove her purity. Seeing the hijab in a married woman’s dream. Dream interpretation jurists say that seeing the hijab in a married woman’s dream means concealment, purity, and stability in her life. However, if she sees her husband wearing a white hijab with embroidery on it, this means that she She will get pregnant soon. A male child. If she is pregnant and sees in her dream that she is taking off the hijab, this indicates that she will be exposed to great competition and conflict with her husband’s family. The black veil in a dream. To see the black veil in her dream is evidence of psychological satisfaction and contentment with her life, but if a married woman sees that her husband gave her a dress as a gift Black with it, it means that her husband is corrupt in his religion and he does a lot. Forbidden things. Other meanings of seeing the hijab in a dream: A woman’s hijab represents her husband, her veil, her master, his ability, the ability of his state, his fitness, the abundance of his money, the whiteness of his religion, and his status. If he sees that she has removed her head veil among men, her modesty is gone. Her husband and his deception, and if he sees the woman as if she is wearing a rain veil, this indicates
